Title: Why Her?
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Gary Lennon, Vladimir Cvetko (story editor), Safia M. Dirie (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Angela learns that Jamie and Ghost are the same person; the drug syndicate welcomes a new member.
